verses.verse: Hear <WH8085>, my sons <WH1121>, the instruction <WH4148> of a father <WH1>, And attend <WH7181> to know <WH3045> understanding <WH998>:
For I give <WH5414> you good <WH2896> doctrine <WH3948>; Forsake <WH5800> ye not my law <WH8451>.
For I was a son <WH1121> unto my father <WH1>, Tender <WH7390> and only <WH3173> beloved in the sight <WH6440> of my mother <WH517>.
And he taught <WH3384> me <WH559>, and said unto me <WH3820>: Let thy heart retain <WH8551> my words <WH1697>; Keep <WH8104> my commandments <WH4687>, and live <WH2421>;
Get <WH7069> wisdom <WH2451>, get <WH7069> understanding <WH998>; Forget <WH7911> not <WH5186>, neither decline from the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310>;
Forsake <WH5800> her not <WH8104>, and she will preserve thee <WH157>; Love her <WH5341>, and she will keep thee.
Wisdom <WH2451> is the principal thing <WH7225>; Therefore get <WH7069> wisdom <WH2451>; Yea <WH7075>, with all thy getting get understanding <WH998>.
Exalt <WH5549> her <WH7311>, and she will promote thee <WH3513>; She will bring thee to honor, when thou dost embrace her <WH2263>.
She will give <WH5414> to thy head <WH7218> a chaplet <WH3880> of grace <WH2580>; A crown <WH5850> of beauty <WH8597> will she deliver to thee <WH4042>.
Hear <WH8085>, O my son <WH1121>, and receive <WH3947> my sayings <WH561>; And the years <WH8141> of thy life <WH2416> shall be many <WH7235>.
I have taught <WH3384> thee in the way <WH1870> of wisdom <WH2451>; I have led <WH1869> thee in paths <WH4570> of uprightness <WH3476>.
When thou goest <WH3212>, thy steps <WH6806> shall not be straitened <WH3334>; And if thou runnest <WH7323>, thou shalt not stumble <WH3782>.
Take fast hold <WH2388> of instruction <WH4148>; Let her not go <WH7503>: Keep <WH5341> her <WH2416>; For she is thy life.
Enter <WH935> not into the path <WH734> of the wicked <WH7563>, And walk <WH833> not in the way <WH1870> of evil men <WH7451>.
Avoid <WH6544> it <WH5674>, pass not by it <WH7847>; Turn from it <WH5674>, and pass on.
For they sleep <WH3462> not <WH7489>, except they do evil; And their sleep <WH8142> is taken away <WH1497>, unless they cause some to fall <WH3782>.
For they eat <WH3898> the bread <WH3899> of wickedness <WH7562>, And drink <WH8354> the wine <WH3196> of violence <WH2555>.
But the path <WH734> of the righteous <WH6662> is as the dawning <WH5051> light <WH216>, That shineth <WH215> more <WH1980> and more unto the perfect <WH3559> day <WH3117>.
The way <WH1870> of the wicked <WH7563> is as darkness <WH653>: They know <WH3045> not at what they stumble <WH3782>.
My son <WH1121>, attend <WH7181> to my words <WH1697>; Incline <WH5186> thine ear <WH241> unto my sayings <WH561>.
Let them not depart <WH3868> from thine eyes <WH5869>; Keep <WH8104> them in the midst <WH8432> of thy heart <WH3824>.
For they are life <WH2416> unto those that find <WH4672> them <WH4832>, And health to all their flesh <WH1320>.
Keep <WH5341> thy heart <WH3820> with all diligence <WH4929>; For out of it are the issues <WH8444> of life <WH2416>.
Put away <WH5493> from thee a wayward <WH6143> mouth <WH6310>, And perverse <WH3891> lips <WH8193> put far from thee <WH7368>.
Let thine eyes <WH5869> look <WH5027> right on <WH5227>, And let thine eyelids <WH6079> look straight before thee <WH3474>.
Make level the path <WH4570> of thy feet <WH7272>, And let all thy ways <WH1870> be established <WH3559>.
Turn <WH5186> not to the right hand <WH3225> nor to the left <WH8040>: Remove <WH5493> thy foot <WH7272> from evil <WH7451>.
